name: Bewitched game
description:
The main character, Alex, is a young girl who, in a very strange way, gets an unusual computer game. And as soon as she launches it, she immediately falls into the plot of a fairy tale for adults, from which she needs to get out, defeating the main villain - the witch Asmodea.
Particular features:
  • Visual novel in genre yuri;
  • Animated СG and very beautiful sprites;
  • Several endings (who said that leaving the game is what you need?!)
  • 5 romance female characters;
  • A few bad endings;
  • Atmospheric backgrounds;
  • Easy relaxing plot, seasoned with a small amount of humor, riddles and even a mini-game.
